nodes.text: The Casino Security of the Canto Casino was the group of plainclothed bouncers who guarded the Canto Casino in the coastal city of Canto Bight on Cantonica. They were responsible to avoid any problem within the casino even while the Canto Bight Police Department could also be called to handle major disturbances in the casino. In case of any disturbances, the Casino Security guards needed to report them to Pemmin Brunce, the head of security.
